ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Peace be upon the family of Yasin!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Peace be with the followers of Elias.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Peace be on Elijah and his people!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Peace and salutation to such as Elias!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Peace be upon the House of Elijah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:130]   ‘Peace, from Us, be to Elias!’. It is said that this [ilyāsīn] is [the same] Elias mentioned above; but it is also said that this denotes him together with [all] those who were believers with him, and so they have been coupled [under the same term] with him being the predominant, as when one might say al-Muhallabūn, ‘the Muhallabids’, to mean al-Muhallab and his folk; a variant reading has āl yāsīn, by which is meant his family as well as Elias himself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Peace be) bliss and safety from Us (unto Elias!) who is none other than Idris the Prophet!
